MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the KY3 postcode area of Burntisland. We had no advance warning of this, and are working to get supplies restored. So far we have been carrying out line patrols and installing fault finding equipment on the electrical network to assist with narrowing down the fault location but due to difficulties on site locating the fault, we now expect your supply to be restored by 8am. We understand that being without power is frustrating and please be assured we will restore your supply as soon as we possibly can. If for any reason this information changes then we will update this message. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:36 AM on Monday, 22 February 2021.
